fish_bulkhead.name: Bulkhead
fish_bulkhead.action_text: After this Internal is marked with damage all left-over damage is lost.

terrifier.name: Terrifier
terrifier.action_text: Engage (1AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 3 - MARBLE Damage [1]

frenzy_sac.name: Frenzy Sac
frenzy_sac.action_text: Engage (1AP): Gain the Frenzy Condition. When this Internal is destroyed this actor gains the Frenzy Condition.

leadership_markings.name: Leadership Markings
leadership_markings.action_text: Engage (1AP): Target up to two allies. They gain the Focused Condition.

leaping_legs.name: Leaping Legs
leaping_legs.action_text: Engage (1AP): Gain the Hover Condition until the end of this turn.

phase_organ.name: Phase Organ
phase_organ.action_text: Engage (2AP): Remove this actor from the battlefield and then set them back down in a space they could occupy up to 5 spaces from their previous position.

psychoactive_venom_sack.name: Psychoactive Venom Sack
psychoactive_venom_sack.action_text: Engage (1AP): Roll 1d6 when this actor hits with a Physical attack. On a 4+ the attack also deals [1] Marble damage. This effect lasts until the end of the turn.

line_cutter.name: Line Cutter
line_cutter.action_text: Engage (1AP): This actor Lowers all Hooked Conditions on it by 2.

pack_mentality_stem.name: Pack Mentality Stem
pack_mentality_stem.action_text: When an ally in Sensors hits with an attack this actor gains the Focused Condition.

shell_i.name: Shell I
shell_i.action_text: After this Internal is marked with damage all left-over damage is lost.

shell_ii.name: Shell II
shell_ii.action_text: After this Internal is marked with damage all left-over damage is lost.

call_of_the_deep.name: Call of the Deep
call_of_the_deep.action_text: Engage (1AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 5 - MARBLE Damage [1]

siren_song.name: Siren Song
siren_song.action_text: Engage (1AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 10 - MARBLE Damage [1]

paranoia.name: Paranoia
paranoia.action_text: Engage (1AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 8 - MARBLE Damage [1]

mesmerizing_lure.name: Mesmerizing Lure
mesmerizing_lure.action_text: Engage (1AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 8 - MARBLE Damage [1]

mental_scream.name: Mental Scream
mental_scream.action_text: Engage (2AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 8 - MARBLE Damage [2]

forbidden_knowledge.name: Forbidden Knowledge
forbidden_knowledge.action_text: Engage (2AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 3 - MARBLE Damage [4]

mindworm.name: Mindworm
mindworm.action_text: Engage (1AP): FAR Attack - Range 3 - Damage [A Mindworm attaches to the target until the end of the Encounter. It deals 1 MARBLE damage at the end of the target’s turns. The target may remove the worm as a 1AP Action.]

drillworm.name: Drillworm
drillworm.action_text: Engage (1AP): FAR Attack - Range 3 - Damage [A Drillworm attaches to the target until the end of the Encounter. It deals 1 damage at the end of the target’s turns. The target may remove the worm as a 1AP Action.]

agitator.name: Agitator
agitator.action_text: Engage (2AP): Choose any number of Allies in your Sensors and give them the Frenzy Condition.

dagons_call.name: Dagon's Call
dagons_call.action_text: Engage (2AP): Target any number of allies. They gain the Quickened 1 Condition.

luminous.name: Luminous
luminous.action_text: Engage (2AP): Target any number of Hostiles in Range 3. They gain the Blind Condition.

ascended_form.name: Ascended Form
ascended_form.action_text: You may voice any Deep Word, except the FInal Word. (This does not mean that you have learned the Deep-Words) Fish voicing Deep Words ignore their Backlash cost. Deep words that are MENTAL attacks also deal 1 MARBLE Damage.

psychic_barrier.name: Psychic Barrier
psychic_barrier.action_text: Engage (1AP): Your Evasion becomes 16 or equal to your WIllpower, whichever is lower, until the start of your next turn.

speaker_system.name: Speaker System
speaker_system.action_text: Engage (1AP): MENTAL Attack - Range 8 - MARBLE Damage [1]

dreadful_flag.name: Dreadful Flag
dreadful_flag.action_text: Engage (3AP): Target any number of Allies. They gain the Wired 1 Condition.

pirate_comms_array.name: Comms Array
pirate_comms_array.action_text: Engage (0AP): Gain the Burdened X Condition in a value of your choice

chrono_amplifier.name: Chrono Amplifier
chrono_amplifier.action_text: Engage (1AP): FAR Attack - Range 10 - Damage [2] - This weapon may target allies, in which case it automatically hits, deals no damage and applies Quickened 1 instead.

forgotten_scan_beacon.name: Forgotten Scan Beacon
forgotten_scan_beacon.action_text: Allies in Sensors gain the Guided Tag on all of their FAR weapons.

forgotten_heat_vent.name: Forgotten Heat Vent
forgotten_heat_vent.action_text: The Unstable Tag does not damage your “Forgotten” Internals.

nano_repair_center.name: Nano Repair Center
nano_repair_center.action_text: All your “Forgotten” Internals lose the Fragile tag.
